item.title: ALIT
item.description: score:30 Chances: Alight Worklife’s latest release delivers AI-driven workforce support, extensive benefits management, and financial and wellbeing features, indicating a potential for continued innovation and revenue growth. The sale of two units within Alight’s Payroll & Professional Services business for up to $1.
